segments.text: I notice the woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice her foot is in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good, but she’s just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever look up and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and it’s going to be a disaster soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and she won’t even notice until it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
